title: BRIEF-Arris Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.07
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Arris International Plc:
* ARRIS ANNOUNCES PRELIMINARY AND UNAUDITED FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.88
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.07 * Q4 REVENUE FELL 1 PERCENT TO $1.739 BILLION * SEES Q1 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.38 TO $0.43 * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $1.575 BILLION TO $1.625 BILLION * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.50 TO $0.55 * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.80 TO $3.05 * SEES FY 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.48 TO $0.73 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $7.1 BILLION TO $7.35 BILLION * PRELIM ‍ORDER BACKLOG AT END OF QUARTER WAS $1.1 BILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
